ai-iti32:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti32:2.1_0: “Mendicants, a person with two qualities is cast down to hell.
ai-iti32:2.4_0: A person who has these two qualities is cast down to hell.”
ai-iti32:2.5_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti32:3.5_0: when their body breaks up, that witless person
ai-iti32:4.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
